About Me

I'm Apichet, a seasoned insurance and risk analyst with over 10 years of experience in the insurance sector. My career spans claims processing, infrastructure damage assessment, policy matching, and data-driven risk consulting for leading logistics and insurance firms. I'm also expanding into Data Science and AI system development to modernize claims analysis and automate risk operations.

üíº Experience Timeline

2022 ‚Äì Present | Insurance Coordinator, Kerry Siam Seaport
- Conducted 200+ damage surveys on cargo, port infrastructure, and machinery
- Led Power BI analytics for accident and insurance loss data
- Liaised with insurers, contractors, shipyards, and courts for claims and legal support
- Developed an incident reporting system, boosting accuracy by 80% 2021 ‚Äì 2022 | CTO, Cheetah Insurance Broker
- Built a real-time car insurance comparison system using Flask + React
- Integrated 2C2P gateway and SEO-optimized frontend
- Oversaw full-stack operations, business growth, and strategic partnerships 2015 ‚Äì 2021 | Head of Claims Control, Tokio Marine
- Managed claim approvals (‚â§‡∏ø50,000) and escalations with Legal
- Negotiated directly with policyholders and resolved disputes
- Handled broker accounts, hospital claims, and litigation prep 2012 ‚Äì 2015 | Car Insurance Dept., Muangthai Insurance
- Managed policy issuance, endorsements, and coordination with internal teams

üß† Technical & Analytical Skills

  • Connected BigQuery to Flask API for dynamic insurance pricing
  • Deployed full-stack app to Railway with token-based auth
üìÅ Project Structure Highlights

  • /frontend ‚Äì React UI with chat + comparison engine
  • /uploads ‚Äì Document/profile uploads folder
  • Dockerfile & docker-compose.yml ‚Äì Deployment
